Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Allegro maestoso in F-sharp major, S. 692c

c. 1827 · LW A8/13 · R. –

[IMSLP]

This piece, which is incomplete, was likely planned a thirteenth étude for the Douze Études (S. 136; LW A8; R. 1). It also exists, with some differences, as an album leaf from 1838.

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · Suppl. 4 · Z. A/B 14499 · ed. Adrienne Kaczmarczyk [including album leaf]

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 3
